EmailTemplate.name: Delay Logic - OBC 2 Delay Mail - EN
EmailTemplate.subject: [IMPORTANT]: Your start with Zeitgold has been postponed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello again {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
I see that your remaining Onboarding [task/-s was/were] unfortunately were not completed by today.
Due to this, we regret to inform you that we will be postponing our cooperation until the [01.DELAY MONTH.YEAR].
We will get in touch with you accordingly to resume Onboarding for the new start dates.
If you have any questions, we are available at any time at service@zeitgold.com or 030/30808111.
Regards,
{{{Sender.FirstName}}} at Zeitgold
